nodes.text: Level 1313 was a level on the metropolitan world of Coruscant, so named because it was located one thousand, three hundred, and thirteen levels from the core of Coruscant, which was accessed by the underworld portal.
About a year before the Battle of Yavin, criminals Dr. Evazan and Ponda Baba were chased through Level 1313 by Coruscant police.

Level 1313 was originally announced to be the setting of the third person shooter Star Wars: 1313 video game. Following the shutdown of LucasArts in 2013, the game was cancelled, also revealing it would have starred Boba Fett. The level first appeared in the Star Wars universe in The Clone Wars' second season episode, "Lethal Trackdown" and fifth season episode, "To Catch a Jedi".
At some point during the existence of the Galactic Empire, Level 1313 was the site of a ruthless criminal underground network which was investigated by Boba Fett.
